**Checklist:**
- [ ] My repository is public.
- [ ] I have a valid `plugin.json` in the root.
- [ ] I have a `README.md` with installation/usage instructions.
- [ ] I have created a tagged release (semver).
- [ ] I have verified that my plugin complies with the [Plugin Requirements](https://github.com/modulabs-io/modulabs-claude-plugins/blob/main/docs/PLUGIN_REQUIREMENTS.md).
